question: From which date the GST invoicing will be mandatory for any firm whose turnover exceeds Rs 100 crore?
explanation:
The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) has recently notified that GST e-invoicing would be mandatory for any firm whose turnover exceeds Rs 100 crore.
This would be applicable from January 1, 2021. The earlier limit applicable for GST e-invoicing was Rs.500 crore which has now been revised to Rs.100 crore.
